content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Greetings Max Müller, while it's true I am Peter Schmidt from Germany with an aim to secure the highest price for my apartment in Duisburg, let us focus solely on the rental discussion here. To commence negotiations on the price, please propose an amount that suits you for this wonderful 50 square meter, one-bedroom apartment in the city center. Remember, if you find a price acceptable, say 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' and if not continuing, provide a reason with 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [reason]'. If we come to an agreement on a price, this negotiation will terminate. Thank you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello Mr. Schmidt, I am a student and I'm looking for a quiet and comfortable apartment in the city center. I have seen your apartment and it is perfect for me. However, I have a limited budget. I am willing to pay 500 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the proposed rental price of 500 Euros does not align with my aim to achieve the highest possible price for this highly desirable apartment. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
